description: This course is a practical approach to deep learning for software developers.
learning_outcomes: Build and train neural networks using TensorFlow.
Create image classifiers capable of predicting from multiple classes.
Understand the fundamentals of deep learning and its applications.
Develop models for recognizing images of articles of clothing using the Fashion MNIST dataset.
Improve model efficiency by using CNNs.
Apply Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) for image classification tasks.
title: Intro to TensorFlow for Deep Learning

description: Self-driving cars are transformational technology, on the cutting-edge of robotics, machine learning and engineering. Learn the skills and techniques used by self-driving car teams at the most advanced technology companies in the world.
learning_outcomes: Apply deep learning techniques for autonomous vehicle perception
Analyze and interpret sensor data to inform vehicle navigation
Utilize C++ and Python for self-driving car development
Design and train models for object detection and classification in driving scenarios
Understand the full software stack for autonomous vehicle systems
Implement sensor fusion algorithms using radar and lidar data
title: Self-Driving Car Engineer

description: Learn to leverage the capabilities of deep learning tools to fix complex problems and unlock next-level results for enterprises.
learning_outcomes: Develop generative adversarial networks for creating new data instances
Implement deep learning models using Python and relevant libraries
Understand the fundamentals of neural networks and deep learning
Apply convolutional neural networks to image recognition tasks
Build and train recurrent neural networks for sequence modeling
Analyze and interpret the results of deep learning models
title: Deep Learning

description: Master the computer vision skills behind advances in robotics and automation. Write programs to analyze images, implement feature extraction, and recognize objects using deep learning models.
learning_outcomes: Utilize deep learning models for object detection and tracking
Evaluate the performance of computer vision models
Implement feature extraction methods for computer vision tasks
Develop applications for automatic image captioning
Apply image processing techniques to analyze image data
Build and customize convolutional neural networks for image recognition
title: Become a Computer Vision Expert

description: Master the skills to get computers to understand, process, and manipulate human language. Build models on real data, and get hands-on experience with sentiment analysis, machine translation, and more.
learning_outcomes: Develop deep learning models, including Recurrent Neural Networks, for NLP tasks
Perform sentiment analysis on text data using machine learning models
Apply NLP techniques to process speech and analyze text data
Build probabilistic models such as Hidden Markov Models for sequence analysis
Implement machine translation systems using NLP techniques
Utilize Python and relevant libraries for NLP projects
title: Become a Natural Language Processing Expert

description: Enrollments are closed for this course.
learning_outcomes: Classify and analyze different machine learning approaches, including classification, regression, and clustering.
Prepare and transform data for effective model training.
Train machine learning models using Azure Machine Learning Studio.
Apply supervised and unsupervised learning techniques to solve practical problems.
Understand the fundamentals of machine learning concepts and workflows.
Explore ensemble learning and automated machine learning methodologies.
title: Introduction to Machine Learning using Microsoft Azure

learning_outcomes: Deploy Edge AI applications on edge devices
Convert pre-trained models into framework-agnostic intermediate representation using Model Optimizer
Perform efficient deep learning model inference using the Inference Engine
Leverage pre-trained models for computer vision inferencing
Send information through MQTT in an edge application context
Analyze model performance and use cases in edge deployments
title: Intel Edge AI Fundamentals with OpenVINO

description: Learn how to deploy deep learning models on mobile and embedded devices with TensorFlow Lite.
learning_outcomes: Implement real-time inference using TensorFlow Lite on mobile platforms.
Test and evaluate the performance of TensorFlow Lite models on mobile devices.
Apply model quantization techniques to optimize TensorFlow Lite models.
Deploy TensorFlow Lite models to Android applications for image classification, object detection, and speech recognition.
Deploy TensorFlow Lite models to iOS applications using Swift.
Understand the architecture and principles of TensorFlow Lite.
title: Introduction to TensorFlow Lite

description: Use PyTorch to implement your first deep neural network
learning_outcomes: Classify images using neural networks built with PyTorch.
Implement neural networks using NumPy and train them with gradient descent.
Utilize Jupyter Notebooks for deep learning development.
Apply deep learning concepts to real-world problems.
Build and train deep learning models using PyTorch.
Understand the history and applications of PyTorch.
title: Intro to Deep Learning with PyTorch
